directions: Blend mayonnaise, sour cream, parsley, tarragon, chives, lemon juice, rice vinegar, anchovy fillet, garlic, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper in a blender until smooth.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, or more to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Chef John's Green Goddess Dressing
